title: Kadhal endru kavidhai Sonnaal Lyrics Marumunai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kadhal Endru
Singer(s): Velmurugan
Movie: Marumunai
Music: Sathya Dev

Kadhal endru kavidhai sonnaal
ulagam rasikkudhu.
kadhalikkum kadhaya sonna
adichi virattudhu.

Kadhal endru kavidhai sonnaal
ulagam rasikkudhu.
kadhalikkum kadhaya sonna
adichi virattudhu.

Yettalavil mattum thaanga kadhal jeyikidhu
veetalavil etti paarthaa oorum eriyudhu
anjarivu mirugam kooda kadhal kolludhu
aararivu manidhan yeno anbai kolludhu

vaai kiliya pesuvorgal vesam poduraar
naayai kooda saadhi paarthu serthu vaikiraar
naayai kooda saadhi paarthu serthu vaikiraar

Munnor sonna pagutharivu
artham palaruku puriyala.
pariyava sonna anbin
kuralum kadhil vilugala.

Saadhi pitham thazhaiku yeri
nidhiyin artham theriyala.
Mathavana enni vazhndhu
pethava manasa kannikala.

Gouravam endra kaanal neeril
karanji pogudhu pinjigal.
kedu ketta manidhan nenjil
ethanai kodi nanjugal.

Arthamulla indhu madham
kannadhasan eludhinaar.
artham purindhu yaaru ingae
anbil vazha palaginaar.

Ulaikalavu kolai thaandi
kaadhal kodum paavama.
thalai kavidhai kadhal enbadhu
vazhkayil perum saabamaa.

Thandavazha inaiserndhaal
rail adhanmel odudhu.
thandavaalam vambu serndhaal
rail udalmel yerudhu.

paalukku kooda kalapasuvai
thaedi thaedi vangudhu
vazhvukku yengum kalapuravai
thaedi poi kolludhu.

Kasum kasum kadhal kondaal
nade vandhu vazhthudhu.
yezhai veetil kadhal vandhaal
dheivamum yamanai maarudhu.

Kadhal endru kavidhai sonnaal
ulagam rasikkudhu.
kadhalikkum kadhaya sonna
adichi virattudhu.

Yettalavil mattum thaanga kadhal jeyikidhu
veetalavil etti paarthaa oorum eriyudhu
anjarivu mirugam kooda kadhal kolludhu
aararivu manidhan yeno anbai kolludhu

vaai kiliya pesuvorgal vesam poduraar
naayai kooda saadhi paarthu serthu vaikiraar
naayai kooda saadhi paarthu serthu vaikiraar

Kadhal endru kavidhai sonnaal
ulagam rasikkudhu.
kadhalikkum kadhaya sonna
adichi virattudhu.
